abstract: A spot for the Arco gasoline stations owned by BP is being withdrawn because the sound effects heard during the commercial set off an emergency alert system in Florida.
snippet: A spot for the Arco gasoline stations owned by BP is being withdrawn because the sound effects heard during the commercial set off an emergency alert system in Florida.
lead_paragraph: Sometimes listeners take issue with a radio commercial because they dislike how it sounds. But a spot for the Arco gasoline stations owned by BP is being withdrawn because the sounds heard during the commercial misfired in at least one instance.
